description.en: She is the perfect student, beautiful, clever and with lots of friends… He is an ordinary boy in the class, staring at her from afar but one day he sees her in a very compromising situation! How will she react? The lives of these two will now intermingle with totally unexpected outcomes!

description.en:
With her mother dead and father long gone, Chise Hatori has spent her childhood being passed unwanted from relative to relative, 
until she finally makes her unfortunate way to a strange and improbable auction block.

Offered as a “Slay Vega” to the highest bidder, Chise is purchased by the (literally) boneheaded Elias Ainsworth, 
who promises to take her on as his apprentice.

Elias is a mage, and his world is one of dragons and faeries - but before Chise can begin to get accustomed to all of this, 
Elias drops another bombshell. Apparently Chise isn't just intended to be his apprentice - she will also be his bride.
description.es: Chise Hatori tiene 15 años. Sin parientes, sin esperanzas en la vida y sin habilidades, fue comprada con dinero por un mago no humano...
description.ja: 少女を金で買ったのは、ヒト為らざる魔法使い――……。羽鳥チセ15歳。身寄りもなく、生きる希望も術も持たぬ彼女を金で買ったのは、ヒト為らざる魔法使いだった……。
description.es-la: Chise Hatori tiene 15 años. Sin parientes, sin esperanzas en la vida y sin habilidades, fue comprada con dinero por un mago no humano...
description.pt-br:
Hatori Chise tem apenas 16 anos, mas ela já perdeu muito mais do que o esperado. Sem uma família nem esperança, parece que todas as portas estão fechadas para ela. Mas um encontro acidental começou a mover as rodas enferrujadas do destino. 

Na sua hora mais escura, um misterioso mago aparece diante de Chise, oferecendo uma chance que ela não poderia recusar. 

Esse mago, que parece mais um demônio do que um humano, irá ele trazer a ela a luz que desesperadamente busca, ou afogá-la em sombras ainda mais profundas?

description.en:
Patalliro is the story of the young boy king Patalliro and his many misadventures as he avoids being assassinated 
by various beautiful boys thanks to the skills of his bodyguard, Major Jack Bancoran from England's Information Bureau. 
Later they're joined by the hot-blooded Maraich, and a beautiful love-and-hate relationship blossoms between him and Bancoran.

This action comedy follows the amnesic Kaleb Tanese, younger brother to the second king of Tanesia, as he runs against time to find the kidnapped holy lady and the stolen six star fragments and prevent the world from descending into another disastrous war. Along with two investigators who are after the truth of the kidnapping, and the captain of Tanesia's knights, he begins by trying to borrow the seventh star fragment, "Alkaid", which can be used to track down the other six.
Sporadically posted comic pages on the official twitter of the Bombergirl arcade game.

description.en:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

---

description.en: The Age of Adventures that started when the Gates opened. The Age of when everything fell apart, filled with desperation, anguish, and misery. And… The Age of when everyone gave up trying to fight back. In that Age, there was only one Explorer who fought to the very end. “You’re the only one left. The Last Explorer, Elpam.” In that moment, the Explorer’s history came to an end, as he returned to the start of the story.

A scout in the infamous Demon Cult, Seolhwi is on a routine patrol when his squad unexpectedly encounters a fearsome master of the Mount Hua Sect, the sworn enemies of the Demon Cult. Without warning, the Mount Hua Cult master slaughters the entire squad. As Seolhwi lies dying, lamenting years of service to the cult with nothing to show for it, he is suddenly faced with a video game prompt, asking if he would like to start again. Given the opportunity to start over and make different choices, Seolhwi vows to survive and become stronger so he can rise to the top of the Demon Cult.

---

description.ja:
魔教の太皇閣主「司魔鬼（しまき）」の命令で華山派の出没地域に派遣された飛客組。「雪輝（せつき）」は華山派の絶対的実力者である「究種明（きゅうしゅめい）」に殺されそうになるが、そのとき目の前に突然、謎の画面が浮かび上がり任務を受ける直前に戻ってしまう。雪輝は前世で自分が殺される原因となった任務に再び就くことになるが、少しでも周りの環境を変えようと奮闘する。危機に陥るたび目の前に現れる画面、そして結果が全く予想できない選択肢。生と死が共存する世界で最善の方法を見つけて進みつづける。

description.ko:
마교의 태왕각주, ‘사마귀’의 명령에 의해 화산파 출목지역으로 파견나간 비객조. 
주인공 ‘설휘’는 화산파 고수 '구종명'과 맞딱드리고, 죽을 위기에 처하게 된다.
그때 눈앞에 상태창이 나타나 정찰임무를 받기 직전 시점으로 회귀하게 된다. 
설휘는 전생에서 죽임을 당했던 똑같은 정찰임무를 받게되자 이 변하지 않는 현실을 바꾸기 위해 발버둥 친다. 
고비마다 눈앞에 나타나는 선택창.
미래를 알 수 없는 선택들.
삶과 죽음이 공존하는 세상 안에서 최고의 방법을 찾기 위한 설휘의 일대기.

description.ru:
Группа разведчиков была направлена в район секты горы Хуаньшань их великим лидером Мантисом. Главный герой, Соль Хви, сталкивается с Мастером секты Хуаньшань – Гу Чжон Мен и оказывается на грани смерти. Появляется окно статуса, которое возвращает его в то время, когда он ещё не принял роковую миссию. 
Вновь получив этот билет в один конец, Соль Хви изо всех сил пытается изменить свою судьбу. Окно статуса, которое появляется в критические моменты. Выбор с неизвестными последствиями. 
Это история Соль Хви, пытающегося найти лучшее решение, идущего по грани жизни и смерти.

description.tr:
Hua Dağı Mezhebinin bölgesine büyük lider ‘Mantis’ tarafından bir grup izci gönderildi.

Kahraman ‘Seol Hwi’ Hua Mezhebinin ustası ‘Goo Jong Myung’la karşılaşır ve ölümle karşı karşıya gelir.

Daha sonra bir durum penceresi açılır ve keşif görevi verilmeden önceki zamana dönmesini sağlar.

Onu ölüme sürükleyen keşif görevini aldıktan sonra, Seol Hwi kaçınılmaz gerçeği değiştirmek için mücadele eder.

Her krizde ortaya çıkan durum penceresi, geleceği belirsiz seçimler yaptırır.

Seol Hwi yaptığı seçimler ile en iyi kararı bulmaya çalışırken yaşam ve ölümle yüzleşmek zorundadır.

description.en:
I don’t want to work. I really don’t want to work. But I have no choice.
Problems with Humans, Elves, Orcs, Trolls, Dragons and such alien immigrants never seem to cease.
800 years of disgusted employment. The struggles of a man who will die if he stops working.

Following a momentous battle against giants for the fate of the world, Ronan emerges victorious as the last man standing of the Imperial Army. As he laments this hollow victory with his dying commander, Grand Marshal Adeshan, they quickly learn that the war is far from over and an overwhelming force of giants descends from the heavens.

Fearing the worst, yet seeing hope in the courageous Ronan, Adeshan uses her last time slip to send him back to the past, so that he can enroll in the prestigious Phileon Academy and become the strongest swordsman the empire has ever seen!

What should you do when a junior colleague of the same sex confesses their feelings for you, and is persistently pursuing you? Not only does voice actor Mason find himself in such a situation, but also unexpectedly discovers that this junior is the very same doujinshi artist behind the R-rated fan comics featuring the two of them! Furthermore, the two are set to work together on a BL radio drama...

When school is over, Tsubasa, an elementary schooler, works at her grandfather's bookstore. The books they provide are of a slightly lewd kind, which is just a little bit of trouble for an elementary schooler.

title.en: SSS-Rank Paladin Who Transcends Common Sense

description.en: The game descended on reality, monsters run rampant, magical disasters overflow, everyone needs to choose a class and level up to become stronger. Zhou Yi who has been unremarkable until now awakened the S+ rank talent Protection of the Sacred Angel on the day of class awakening, turning his class into the hidden class Sacred Knight! Weapon blessing, angel blessing, honor blessing… With all sorts of buffs, Zhou Yi destroyed the space itself with just his aura. Who was it that said sacred knight is just a mundane class?
description.fr: Le jeu est entré dans la réalité, les monstres se déchaînent, les catastrophes magiques débordent, chacun doit choisir une classe et monter en niveau pour devenir plus fort. Zhou Yi, qui n'avait rien de remarquable jusqu'à présent, a éveillé le talent de rang S+ Protection de l'ange sacré le jour de l'éveil de classe, transformant sa classe en classe cachée Chevalier sacré ! Bénédiction de l'arme, bénédiction de l'ange, bénédiction de l'honneur... Avec toutes sortes d'améliorations, Zhou Yi détruisait l'espace lui-même avec sa seule aura. Qui a dit que le Chevalier sacré n'était qu'une classe banale ?
description.pt-br: O jogo emerge na realidade, os monstros correm desenfreados, os desastres mágicos transbordam, todos precisam escolher uma classe e subir de nível para aprimorarem a sua força. Zhou Yi, que tem sido uma pessoa normal até então, despertou o talento de classificação S+ "Proteção do Anjo Sagrado" no dia de despertar de classes, transformando sua classe na classe oculta "Cavaleiro Sagrado"! Bênção de arma, bênção do anjo, bênção de honra... Com todos os tipos de buffs, Zhou Yi destruiu o próprio espaço apenas com sua aura. Quem foi que disse que o paladino era uma classe mundana?

description.de:
Im Alter von acht Jahren verlor Ijin Yoo seine Eltern bei einem Flugzeugabsturz und strandete in einem fremden Land, wo er gezwungen war, ein Kindersöldner zu werden, um zu überleben. Zehn Jahre später kehrt er nach Hause zurück, um mit seiner Familie in Korea wieder vereint zu sein. Dort scheint alles friedlich zu sein, doch schon bald muss Ijin feststellen, dass das Leben als Teenager eine ganz andere Art des Überlebens ist. Da ihm nur noch ein Jahr in der Oberschule bleibt, muss Ijin neue Taktiken erlernen, um sich auf dem Schlachtfeld der Schule zurechtzufinden. Kann er ein Jahr Oberschule überleben? Oder wird die Schule vielmehr in der Lage sein, IHN zu überleben?

---
Die Geschichte handelt von einem jungen Koreaner, der bei einem Flugzeugabsturz seine Eltern verloren hat. Das Kind landet irgendwie in einem vom Krieg zerrissenen Teil der Welt und wird zu einem Top-Söldner im Teenageralter. Irgendwie findet er seine Familie wieder und beschließen, ein ruhiges Leben mit seiner Familie zu führen.

---

description.en:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
description.es:
A los ocho años, Ijin Yu perdió a sus padres en un accidente aéreo y quedó varado en un país extranjero, forzado a convertirse en mercenario para sobrevivir. Diez años después, regresa a su hogar para reunirse con su familia en Corea, en donde sobra la comida y todo parece estar en paz. Sin embargo, Ijin pronto descubrirá que la vida de adolescente es otro tipo de supervivencia. En su último año de secundaria, Ijin debe dominar nuevas tácticas para resistir en el campo de batalla escolar. ¿Podrá sobrevivir a su último año? ¿O podrá su escuela sobrevivir a él?

---

description.en:
Kinoshita Kazuya is a regular college student who was just dumped by his girlfriend for another guy. Feeling down in the dumps, he decides to use an app called Diamond to hire Mizuhara Chizuru, a rental girlfriend, to make himself feel better. From their first meeting, she seems to be the perfect girl for him, but is there more to her than meets the eye? And how will their not quite typical relationship develop?

---
**Links:**

- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10001/episode/312699) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/rent-a-girlfriend/)
description.fr: Kinoshita Kazuya est un étudiant régulier qui vient d'être largué par sa petite amie pour un autre gars. Se sentant dans les décharges, il décide d'utiliser une application appelée Diamond pour embaucher Mizuhara Chizuru, une petite amie de location, afin de se sentir mieux. Dès leur première rencontre, elle semble être la fille parfaite pour lui, mais est-ce qu'il y a autre chose pour elle que ce qui est à l'oeil? Et comment va se développer leur relation pas tout à fait typique?
description.it: Kinoshita Kazuya è un normale studente universitario che è stato appena lasciato dalla sua ragazza. Devastato, decide di usare un app chiamata "Diamond" per reclutare Mizuhara Chizuru, una ragazza a noleggio per tirargli su il morale. Fin dal loro primo incontro, sembra essere la ragazza perfetta per lui, ma ci sarà altro dietro a quell'immagine da "brava ragazza"…? E come si evolverà la loro inusuale relazione?
description.pt: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar uma aplicação de relacionamentos depois de ter levado terminado com a sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!
description.ru: Двадцатилетний никудышный студент университета муниципального района Киносита Кадзуя. Встреча с «особенной» красавицей ознаменует начало изменений в его жизни?!
description.pt-br: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar um aplicativo de relacionamentos depois de ter levado um fora de sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

title.en: I Brought Home a Succubus Who Failed to Find a Job.

altTitles.fr: J'ai ramené chez moi une Succube qui ne trouve pas d'emploi

altTitles.es: Llevé un Súcubo a casa que no pudo encontrar trabajo

altTitles.ja: 就活失敗したサキュバスさんを拾いました

altTitles.pt-br: Levei para casa uma súcubos que não conseguiu encontrar um emprego.

altTitles.ja-ro: Shuukatsu Shippai shita Succubus-san wo Hiroimashita

description.en: Man brings home succubus, doesn’t get fucked. Instead, gets a cute succubus to take care of him.

description.fr: Nous sommes tous passés par là, ou devons y faire face, de quelle couleur sont vos souvenirs d'adolescence ?

altTitles.ja: カラスみたいなミヤマくん

altTitles.en: The Blood Star Damned by Heaven

altTitles.pt-br: A Estrela de Sangue Amaldiçoada pelo Céu

description.en: Cheon Yoo-ok, a young orphan who survives by begging, however, as he delves deeper into the mysteries of a sect, dark secrets and unknown threats begin to emerge, in a world where intrigues and conspiracies are everywhere, he will have You have to overcome unimaginable challenges to protect those you love and discover your true destiny.
description.pt-br: Cheon Yoo-ok, um jovem órfão que sobrevive pedindo esmolas, porém, à medida que ele se aprofunda nos mistérios de uma seita, segredos sombrios e ameaças desconhecidas começam a surgir, em um mundo onde intrigas e conspirações estão por toda parte, ele terá que superar desafios inimagináveis para proteger aqueles que ama e descobrir seu verdadeiro destino.

title.en: The Ranker's Guide to Live an Ordinary Life

altTitles.en: A Guide to the Right Life for Rankers

description.en:
The first S-class Awakened is really a third-rate student?!

In the 21st century, the world became a 'fantasy'. In a South Korea filled with despair, S-classes have descended! The greatest of them - Witch Queen Jyo!

"Goddess Jyo... Queen Jyo... Who are you...? Who could it be?"

The true identity of the savior who has been shrouded in mystery for 10 years. Her identity? Gyung Jyo, a third-rate student, who's unable to make outgoing calls due to her mother's anger.and on the verge of being strangled and trapped in the abyss.

She was leading a peaceful and ordinary life as Korea's top unemployed person, however...

[The rankings are being updated.]
[Your current ranking has dropped to 2nd place.] 

"!?"

"I know who you are, Witch Queen."

Baek Dohyun, a regressor, appears in front of Gyung Jyo!

Will Gyung Jyo, an S-class Munchkin ranker, be able to maintain her comfortable and lazy tyrant life, as her well-rolling life turns upside down into the position of the world's savior?

description.fr: Yonggi a en réalité peur des femmes ?! Yonggi, beau et populaire comme jamais, semble avoir tout. Mais l'apparence peut décevoir, et il joue définitivement la carte de l'escroquerie à long terme. Il n'est pas le Casanova que tout le monde pense ! Un jour, son ancienne camarade de classe, Suyeon, arrive sur son lieu de travail. Sera-t-elle celle qui apaisera enfin son cœur inquiet ?

altTitles.ja: シメジシミュレーション

description.en:
A surreal yet heartwarming 4-koma series about everyday life.  
  
From the author of Shoujo Shuumatsu Ryokou/Girls' Last Tour.
description.fr: Une jeune fille s'est enfermée dans son placard pendant ses 2 dernières années de collège et se rend compte qu'elle doit maintenant passer au lycée. Quand elle sort de son placard pour la première fois en deux ans et se regarde dans le miroir, elle s'aperçoit que des champignons « shimeji » ont commencé à pousser sur sa tête.

description.en:
Maid Refreshment "Comet Bug" stands quietly amidst the bustle of the city. This is a place where both master and lady can return anytime. It is a place where there are "maids" who will gently and calmly accompany the tired hearts of the customers. There, Pero, a new maid, is about to receive her first customer. Pero desperately wants to heal him from his deep wounds, even if only for a moment. 

A warm and sad love story that shines faintly at the maid refreshment shop open late at night.

---

NOTE: This series contains topics that can be triggering.

description.fr:
Wooju est obsédé par la fortune et les superstitions. Dojin est un psychiatre qui s'avère être gay mais qui reste dans le placard (il n'a pas fait son coming-out). Alors que Dojin a un rendez-vous arrangé avec la grande sœur de Wooju, elle comprend immédiatement la situation et propose un marché avec Dojin. Elle maintiendra sa ruse pour garder la mère de Dojin heureuse en échange de l'aide de Dojin pour traiter la pathologie de Wooju.
Dojin serait-il le porte-bonheur dont Wooju a besoin...?

altTitles.en: Apotheosis – Elevation to the Status of a God
Principles of Heavens - Zen’s Cultivation of Immortality

description.en: Luo Zheng, now a humble slave was born as the eldest son of a wealthy family. Due to his family's decline, the kidnapping of his sister by a powerful force, he can now only be stepped upon by others. However, heaven never seals off all exits. An ancient book left by his father reveals a secret divine technique, giving the reader immense power! But what is behind this power? This is a contest against fate.
description.fr:
Luo Zheng est un esclave qui était auparavant fils ainé d’une famille riche. En raison du déclin de sa famille et de l’enlèvement de sa sœur par une force puissante, il est désormais piétiné et humilié par les autres. Cependant, le paradis ne scelle jamais toutes les sorties. Un livre ancien laissé par son père révèle une technique divine secrète, donnant au lecteur un immense pouvoir ! Mais que cache ce pouvoir ? Une course contre le destin débute !  
  


---

Official English Alternative:  
<https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/119>
description.it: Luo Zheng, ora un umile schiavo, è nato come il figlio maggiore di una famiglia ricca. A causa del declino della sua famiglia, del rapimento di sua sorella da parte di una forza potente, ora può essere calpestato solo da altri. Tuttavia, il paradiso non chiude mai tutte le uscite. Un libro antico lasciato da suo padre rivela una tecnica divina segreta, dando al lettore un potere immenso! Ma cosa c'è dietro questo potere? Questa è una gara contro il destino.

altTitles.ja: WORST外伝 ゼットン先生

description.en: After years of studying, Hanazawa Saburou, AKA Suzuran's legendary Zetton, has finally become a high school teacher. But on his first day at work, the principal tells him he was actually hired not to teach, but to make the students of his homeroom class drop out of school?!
description.ru: После долгих лет учёбы Сабуро Ханадзава, также известный как легендарный Зеттон Судзурана, наконец-то стал учителем средней школы. Но в первый же день на работе директор рассказал ему, что на самом деле его наняли не для того, чтобы преподавать, а для того, чтобы заставить учеников вверенного ему класса бросить школу!

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu

description.de:
Der Teenager Ichikawa Kyoutarou gehört zu den allerletzten auf seiner Schule. Neben seinen Bemühungen, Unterhaltungen mit einer bestimmten Klassenkameradin aufrechtzuerhalten, muss er sich außerdem noch dafür zusammenreißen, mörderische Dränge aus den Tiefen seiner Seele zu verbergen.

Eigentlich ist es aber eine niedliche Liebesgeschichte zwischen einem geistig gestörten Jungen und einer fröhlichen, leicht komisch, jedoch schönen Mädchen.
description.en:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

- Won the Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020 Award.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taisho Award.
- Won the top prize of 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards
description.ja:
学園カースト頂点の美少女・山田杏奈の殺害を妄想してはほくそ笑む、重度の中二病の陰キャ・市川京太郎。だが山田を観察する内に、京太郎が思う「底辺を見下す陽キャ」とは全然違うことに徐々に気づいていき…!? 陰キャ男子

---

- Exclusive art is occasionally posted to [the series' official account](https://twitter.com/boku__yaba/status/1060017522303414273)
description.ru: «Страшный психо-триллер», сосредоточенный на «тёмной стороне юности». История повествует о Киотаро Ичикаве — человеке, находящемся на самой низшей ступени в своей школе и скрывающем убийственный порыв, находящийся в самой глубине его души... на деле же, это милый ром-ком про странного мальчика и прекрасную, хоть и слегка странную, девушку.
description.es-la:
La historia trata sobre un joven llamado Kyotaro Ichikawa que sufre de un caso grave de “chūnibyō” y se divierte imaginando la muerte de una hermosa chica llamada Anna Yamada, quien está en la cima de la jerarquía social de la escuela. Sin embargo, mientras observa a Yamada, Kyotaro comienza a darse cuenta de que ella es muy diferente de lo que él pensaba.

 - Ganó el premio Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020.
- Fue nominado para el premio Manga Taisho en 2020 y 2021.
- Ganó el primer premio en los premios Tsutaya Comic de 2021.
description.pt-br:
Um "intenso thriller psicológico" centralizado no lado obscuro da adolescência. 

O mangá gira em torno de Kyoutaro Ichikawa, uma pessoa no fundo da hierarquia de sua escola, que esconde um impulso assassino no fundo de sua alma. Mas na realidade, é uma doce comédia romântica entre um garoto confuso e uma garota brilhante, embora um tanto estranha e bonita.

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα τους διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

altTitles.vi: Thiên đường song song tại dị giới

description.en: One day at school, Youta sees someone strange entering his school. Out of nowhere this being appears next to him and makes him fall from the 3rd floor. He lands in a strange world, where beings like dragons exist! Youta meets a young paladin, and discovers that he is the only man inhabiting that planet, and that its inhabitants are extremely 'weak' to his presence. Could this be paradise?

title.en: Last Karte - Houjuuigakusha Touma Kenshou no Kioku

altTitles.ja: ラストカルテ-法獣医学者 当麻健匠の記憶-

description.en: Kenshou Touma is a ordinary high schooler with worries and dreams about his future, just like everyone else. One day, he comes across a large number of crows in the park that have died an unnatural death. And while involved in that incident, a certain superpower manifests in him...

title.en: Watashi ga Watashi wo Uru Riyuu

altTitles.ja: 私がわたしを売る理由

description.en: Tsubaki, who entered a famous university in Tokyo, struggles to cover her tuition and living expenses without support from her parents. When she loses her part-time job due to the declaration of a state of emergency, she desperately searches for other employment opportunities and comes across the words "sugar dating."
When a police officer is posted to a remote village in the countryside, little does he realize he's encroaching on a community of cannibals…
description.ru:
Полицейский Дайго Агава вместе с семьёй переезжает в горную деревушку под названием Цветочная. Жители деревни горячо принимают семью Дайго.
Однажды в лесу находят труп старушки. После этого происшествия Дайго постепенно начинает осознавать все происходящие вокруг странности и приходит к мысли, что в этой деревне едят людей. Начинают происходить очень странные инциденты, атмосфера отчуждения наполняет деревню. Сможет ли обычный полицейский разгадать все ужасные тайны, которая таит в себе эта деревня и, что важнее, сможет ли он остаться в живых?

title.en: Ore Igai Dare mo Saishu Dekinai Sozai na no ni "Sozai Saishuritsu ga Hikui" to Pawahara suru Osananajimi Renkinjutsushi to Zetsuen shita Senzoku Madoushi, Henkyou no Machi de Slow Life wo Okuritai.

altTitles.ja: 俺以外誰も採取できない素材なのに「素材採取率が低い」とパワハラする幼馴染錬金術師と絶縁した専属魔導士、辺境の町でスローライフを送りたい。

altTitles.en: The Assistant Mage Parts Ways With His Power Abusive Alchemist Childhood Friend and His Being Told to Have "Low Chance of Gathering Materials," and Wants to Start a Slow Life at a Town in the Remote Region
Only I Can Collect These Materials! ~ An Assistant Mage Who Broke up With His Alchemist Girlfriend After Her Harassment Wants to Lead a Slow Life in a Remote Town

altTitles.id: Padahal Hanya Aku yang Dapat Mengumpulkan Material Itu, tapi Aku Dikatai "Tingkat Pengumpulan Materialmu Ampas" sama Teman Semasa Kecilku yang Menjadi Alkemis, Aku pun Pensiun Menjadi Asisten Penyihirnya dan Memulai Hidup Baru yang Santai di Kota Terpencil.

description.en:
The Assistant Mage of the genius alchemist Ruby—Lloyd has an abnormally low chance of gathering materials for alchemy use. Hence, he is treated as baggage and is made to be the bottom of the entire country’s joke. 

Everyday is a day he is scolded by Ruby. It’s become too much of a despairing environment that he’s come to hate it. And so, he finally decided to part ways with her. 

However, unbeknownst to everyone was that the materials Lloyd gathered were all high-grade materials no one else could gather.

The mage, who was treated as “incompetent” and saw himself as such, now aims for an ideal easy going life!
description.id: Asisten Penyihir, Lloyd, mempunyai kemampuan mengumpulkan material untuk alkemis yang rendah daripada orang lain yang membuat Alkemis yang menggangdengnya, Ruby, terus-terusan memarahi Lloyd yang dimatanya tidak pernah benar. Suatu hari dia muak dengan perlakuan Ruby yang makin menjadi-jadi dan memutuskan untuk pensiun menjadi asisten penyihirnya. Lantas, akan ke mana Lloyd pergi?

description.en:
People have been created that are human-animal hybrids, and powerful businesses bet on the outcome of their duels. College student Nomoto Yuuya's casual acquaintances ask him to drive them around to pick up girls one day, which he soon finds out means by force. The girl they kidnap is an animal-human hybrid named Hitomi, who slaughters all of them except Yuuya. Hitomi is a honey badger, which has been called the most fearless of all animals. Now Hitomi is assigned to stay with Yuuya, for his protection!
Killing Bites are underworld duels between human-animal hybrids. One beast who knows no fear will fight in this animalistic world full of fear and insanity. This ultimate battle of the beasts will shock you to your core!

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%AD%E3%83%AA%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B0%E3%83%90%E3%82%A4%E3%83%84)
description.ru:
Один учёный создал существ которые являются гибридом человека и животного, и богачи ставят ставки на исход их поединков. Случайные знакомые просят студента колледжа Номота Юя покатать их по городу, и ближе к вечеру он узнает, что они просто хотели подобрать и изнасиловать девушку. Девушка, которую они похищают оказывается “гибридом” которую зовут Хитоми, которая убивает всех кроме Юи. Хитоми является гибридом барсука, который был назван самым бесстрашным из всех животных. Теперь Хитоми остаётся с Юи, для его защиты!  


---

**Links:**  
- [Shinya Murata's Twitter](https://twitter.com/jojojon)  
- [Sumita's Twitter](https://twitter.com/s_kazasa)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20213)
description.pt-br: Pessoas estão sendo criadas como híbridos animal-humano e batalham entre si, empresas poderosas apostam no resultado de seus duelos. A história inicia com um cara que se meteu no rapto de uma garota contra a sua vontade, todos menos ele acabam mortos pela garota, que ele descobre ser um dos híbridos, competindo com outros de sua raça em duelos mortais envolvendo complexas apostas. Sem aviso prévio, ele acaba obrigado a se tornar o parceiro da garota.

title.en: Saving 80,000 Gold in Another World for My Retirement

altTitles.fr: Économiser 80,000 pièces d'or dans un autre monde pour ma retraite

altTitles.ja-ro: Rougo ni Sonaete Isekai de 8-manmai no Kinka wo Tamemasu

altTitles.ru: Сохранение 80 000 золотых монет в другом мире для моей старости

altTitles.zh: 为了养老金，去异界存八万金！

altTitles.zh-hk: 為了養老金，去異界存八萬金！

altTitles.ja: 老後に備えて異世界で８万枚の金貨を貯めます

altTitles.es: Ahorre 80 000 monedas de oro en otro mundo en preparación para mi jubilación

altTitles.ko: 노후를 대비해 이세계에서 금화 8만 개를 모읍니다

description.en: After growing up an orphan, Mitsuha has a healthy respect for money and a desire to live well—at least, until she dies after being pushed off a cliff. Waking up in a strange fantasy world, Mitsuha narrowly survives an encounter with a pack of wolves, then realizes she has the power to move between this world and the real one. A lesser person might embark on heroic adventures—Mitsuha instead immediately recognizes the lucrative possibilities of her new situation, and heads out to buy an arsenal of modern weapons. Her goal: to acquire 80,000 gold, and the life of leisure she’s always dreamed of! [Kodansha]
description.pt-br: Uma garota de 18 anos que perdeu sua família em um acidente, Yamano Mitsuha cai de um penhasco em um dia qualquer e é transportada para um mundo diferente com uma civilização ao nível da Europa Medieval. Mitsuha descobre que é possível ir e retornar à terra após uma luta mortal com lobos. Assim, ela decide viver em ambos os mundos. “Para ter segurança na velhice, eu vou mirar em alcançar 80.000 moedas de ouro!” “Tentarei não deixar coisas estranhas circularem para não distorcer o progresso do mundo, mas não vou me conter pelo bem da minha vida fácil e segura!” Enquanto usa três pistolas junto com palavras e ações que parecem decentes, em sua cabeça Yamano Mitsuha é uma garota esperta. Fazendo um esforço para ganhar dinheiro mesmo com um pequeno corpo que parece uma criança para os ocidentais!

description.en: The remote town of North Hill has been quarantined to prevent the spread of the mysterious Couper disease that is turning people into cannibals. Young soldier Billy returns to his hometown for the first time in six years for the woman he loves, but what horrors will be awaiting him...?

title.en: Touhou Suichouka ~ Lotus Eater-tachi no Suisei

altTitles.en: The Lotus Eaters, Drunk and Sober
Touhou Drunken Butterfly Flower ~ Lotus Eaters' Sobering

altTitles.ja: 東方酔蝶華　ロータスイーター達の酔醒

description.en: In this sixth official Touhou manga series from ZUN, the shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei goes to investigate a strange rumor in the human village, where she gets involved with the local Geidontei bar and its poster girl, Miyoi Okunoda.
description.ja: 幻想郷の人里にある居酒屋「鯢呑亭（げいどんてい）」には、最近、飲んだ帰りの客が妖怪にさらわれて失踪するという噂が。博麗神社の巫女・霊夢はこの疑惑の調査に乗り出す。どうやらカギは看板娘の美宵のようで…？
description.es-la:
En la aldea humana de Gensokyo, un rumor sobre un youkai que supuestamente secuestra a personas alcoholizadas se extiende de forma repentina con gran rapidez, causando miedo y preocupación entre la gente. Mientras tanto, en el centro de este rumor, el bar izakaya Geidontei, no hay nada fuera de lugar en lo que respecta a su comida y bebida, o incluso con respecto a su propietario.

Cuando la sacerdotisa Reimu Hakurei se entera de la situación, intenta cumplir con su deber de investigar el sospechoso establecimiento. Sin embargo, el caso la lleva a otra persona: Miyoi Okunoda, cuya existencia parece ser tan volátil como una burbuja.
description.pt-br:
Uma estranha história sobre álcool. O mais novo mangá oficial de "Touhou", escrito por ZUN.   
  
Existe um rumor de que em um bar chamado "Geidontei", localizado em uma área remota de Gensokyo, um cliente bêbado foi sequestrado por um youkai. Reimu, sacerdotisa do Santuário Hakurei, embarca em uma investigação, mas aparentemente, a chave para desvendar o caso está na garçonete da loja…?

description.en: At a certain prison under the surface, the "bottom of the bottom" that is the Teiai Underground Labor Facility, there is a man who uses his "one-day outing passes" to go above ground and enjoy all the luxuries of life while living in the poor conditions of the underground. His name is Ootsuki, and he is the leader of Squad E and a master of enjoying himself all day long with eating, drinking, and having a great time.

Ye-hwa, who lost Jeong-in and was humiliated by the sudden attack on her soul on the day of her death, tries to kill herself to escape from the monster who is obsessed with her, but when she opens her eyes again, she returns to 10 years ago and meets the monster who takes care of her...

Who the hell is this creature that is not in her memory, and why has he ruined herself so much in the future while taking care of her in the past? Can she change the past and create a different future?
description.es-la: Yehwa perdió a Jeongin y fue secuestrada y humillada debido a un ataque repentino el día de su boda. Debido a las circunstancias, Yehwa intenta suicidarse para escapar del monstruo que está obsesionado con ella, pero cuando se despierta de nuevo, se remonta a la época en la que ella tenía 10 años. Un día Ye-hwa vuelve a encontrarse con el monstruo, pero en esta ocasión ese ser la cuida mucho, en contraposición con el pasado. ¿Quién es este monstruo el cual no está o no se comporta como en su memoria? ¿Por qué la cuida tanto ahora y la arruino tanto en el futuro?. Yehwa, ¿Será capaz de cambiar el pasado y crear un futuro diferente?

description.en:
While in hot pursuit of wanted criminals, police officer Do Gyeong Joon has an unexpected encounter with a rather uncanny demon. Barely surviving the accident, he is left baffled, staring at the sky at the retreating form of the mysterious being he had just met. However, not long after, the two meet again when the demon crashes into Gyeong Joon’s apartment, whispering,  
“Hurry up! I need to get inside you-”

Alpha genes produce people with exceptional appearance, intelligence, and abilities, but only exists in 1/100,000 people. Nobunaga, born an alpha, will always attract other people. Despite having everything, all he wanted for was "a turn of fate." After meeting a woman that filled him with a need to have her and only her, the ultimate climax starts!
description.pl: Nobunaga wygrał loterię genetyczną i urodził się jako alfa (α): jego uroda, inteligencja i talent doprowadzają wszystkich do szaleństwa z pożądania. Mimo pozornie doskonałego życia Nobunaga jest niezadowolony - do czasu, gdy poznaje kobietę swoich marzeń, która może zaspokoić każde jego pragnienie.

description.en:
1199 - 10 years after the death of Minamoto no Yoshitsune at Hiraizumi. Japan is now under the shogun Minamoto no Yoriie, son of Yoritomo, who had schemed against Yoshitsune. Yoriie hears of followers of Yoshitsune still lurk about, and is more than willing to get rid of those thorns in his side. However, they are more pertinent than he could imagine...for Yoshitsune's orphaned son, Hoshiwakamaru, has survived, and is planning to avenge his father with fellow pirates and conspiring officials!

A tale of alternate history set at the dawn of the Kamakura period, with some fantastical elements mixed in.

description.en:
Set 10 years prior to the original series, the story centers around Sword Maiden's party of six adventurers on their journey to the Dungeon of the Dead to kill the Demon Lord.  

**Note**:   
*Goblin Slayer Gaiden 2: Tsubanari no Daikatana* is a spin-off series of the main Goblin Slayer! light novel. This is the second manga adaptation of the light novel after the cancellation of [the first one](https://mangadex.org/title/46704) after only 3 chapters.
description.ru: История берёт начало за десять лет до событий «Убийцы гоблинов». В центре сюжета «Меч девы» — группа из шести авантюристов, отправившихся в Подземелье Мертвых, чтобы убить Короля Демонов.
